author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA (delivering the judgment of the court):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeals Nos 168 and 171 of 2015
casename: Turf Club Auto Emporium Pte Ltd and others v Yeo Boong Hua and others and another appeal
coram: Sundaresh Menon CJ, Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA, Judith Prakash JA, Tay Yong Kwang JA and Steven Chong JA
counsel: Kelvin Poon and Alyssa Leong (Rajah & Tann Singapore LLP) for the first to fourth appellants in Civil Appeal No 168 of 2015;Irving Choh and Melissa Kor Wan Wen (Optimus Chambers LLC) for the fifth appellant in Civil Appeal No 168 of 2015 and the appellant in Civil Appeal No 171 of 2015;Adrian Tan, Ong Pei Ching, Joel Goh Chee Hsien and Hari Veluri (TSMP Law Corporation) for the respondents in Civil Appeals Nos 168 and 171 of 2015.
